name: Black Ops 2 Zombies Remake
description:
This project is hugely inspired by Black Ops 2 Zombies where your main task is to survive endless zombie waves. At the moment, this project features:

  • 2 maps inspired by original Kino der Toten and Town
  • Many Black Ops weapons such as the legendary Raygun, RPK or MP-40
  • Original perks such as the Quick Revive, Jogger Nog, Pack-a-Punch and many more! But like in the original Zombies - do not forget to turn on the power haha!
  • Mystery box
  • AI original characters like Edward Richtofen, Tank Dempsey or Nikolai Belinsky

Although I know that there are a lot of things to improve, it was really fun making this project.
